img_above_text:
![Woods Ember Walkthrough \(44\).png](https://oyster.ignimgs.com/mediawiki/apis.ign.com/black-myth-wukong/3/35/Woods_Ember_Walkthrough_%2844%29.png)
Once the area is clear, open the chest that the Bull Soldier was guarding. This will give you Cold Iron Leaves and Will.
img_below_text:
Turn and face the opposite direction and deal with the archer on the stairs to the right first. Climb up the stairs to reach a wooden structure, where you can find the first Meditation Spot of the Chapter.
![Woods Ember Walkthrough \(43\).png](https://oyster.ignimgs.com/mediawiki/apis.ign.com/black-myth-wukong/3/34/Woods_Ember_Walkthrough_%2843%29.png)
summary_promot:
You are shown an image extracted from a video game walkthrough or guide.


        
        Context:
        - Preceding Text: "![Woods Ember Walkthrough \(44\).png](https://oyster.ignimgs.com/mediawiki/apis.ign.com/black-myth-wukong/3/35/Woods_Ember_Walkthrough_%2844%29.png)
Once the area is clear, open the chest that the Bull Soldier was guarding. This will give you Cold Iron Leaves and Will."
        - Following Text: "Turn and face the opposite direction and deal with the archer on the stairs to the right first. Climb up the stairs to reach a wooden structure, where you can find the first Meditation Spot of the Chapter.
![Woods Ember Walkthrough \(43\).png](https://oyster.ignimgs.com/mediawiki/apis.ign.com/black-myth-wukong/3/34/Woods_Ember_Walkthrough_%2843%29.png)"

        Your task:
        1. Generate a **short, clear, and informative English summary** of the image.
        2. Focus primarily on the **preceding and following text** to infer the image's **purpose, content, or narrative role**.
        3. Do **not** speculate beyond the visible content.
img_summary: The image depicts a rocky, desolate area with stairs leading upward, where an archer enemy is positioned. The red arrow indicates the player's next objective: to confront the archer on the stairs. This follows clearing the previous area and opening a chest guarded by a Bull Soldier, and precedes climbing the stairs to reach a wooden structure containing the first Meditation Spot of the chapter.
